answers.answer: When you say "white," is it fluid filled, or simply discolored? Is it raised or flat?

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Any blister in that area should immediately be shown to the doctor since you have history of diabetes (it can just be a boil) and cancer. It can also be herpes or even genital wart. So please check with your doctor at the earliest. Take care!

question: I have a small white blister apeared a week ago between my front and back passage on outside skin near hairs.   I am 76.  I have diabetes (diet controlled) hace had cancer twice but this isnt hard or pea like.  a little tender, possibly didnt notice straight away.  Does it sound urgent........goldenoldie.  I also have allergies and Asthma and Rhinitis and Blood pressure. so take quite a bit of medication.    weeks ago had 0p for Sinus, nasal polyos, (FESS) is the leaflet they gave me.
title: Urgent or not
